title: James Wynn's $1.27B BTC Long Liquidation: $85M Loss on Hyperliquid
summary: Pseudonymous trader James Wynn built a $1.27 billion BTC long position on Hyperliquid using 40x leverage in May 2025, showing $40M unrealized gains at peak. His account value crashed from $90M to $5M (94% drawdown) in 8 days, serving as a live stress test for Hyperliquid which handled the massive position without system failure.
